bibl.title: Letter from B.F. Rittenhouse to Howard A. Kelly, July 4, 1907

div1.p: Rittenhouse sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from B.F. Rittenhouse to Howard A. Kelly, July 4, 1907
div1.opener:
Fort Gibbon Tauana Alaska
July 4th 1907
$25.00
dep.
To
Mr Howard A. Kelly.
1418 Eutaw Place.
Baltimore Md.
acknowledged
Dear Sir:
div1.p:
I have just read the
article “A Hero from the Ranks”
in the Outlook for June 29th
and am touched with it.
Indeed please find my
checks for $25- for Mr. John R.
Kissingers benefit. or for his
family. A noble man, a
hero indeed. I trust that
you may receive numerous
responses from this notice -
in the Outlook.

Please do not have my name
publish in the list of contributors
if there should be a list. let it
go in as B.F.R.
